Title: Eat, Spray, Linda
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Jon Schroeder
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: It's Linda's birthday and Bob needs more time to plan her birthday surprise. But when he sends her out of the house as a distraction, she goes missing. Mayhem ensues as the Belchers must work together to find Linda.
